uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content

Class JsonBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content.JsonBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleXMLBuilder

    public class JsonBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleXMLBuilder
    An implementation of SimpleXMLBuilder that builds an equivalent JSON document. This version has no external dependencies so has to do its own escaping etc. A reconfigurable factory method is provided so that alternate implementations can be included in projects that use a 3rd party JSON library.
    Author:
    spb

      • getNested

        public SimpleXMLBuilder getNested()
                           throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: SimpleXMLBuilder
        Get a new SimpleXMLBuilder of the same type as this object. This is to build un-commited content that is appended to this object using the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method. The calling code need only hold a reference to the current builder as the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method returns the parent.
        Specified by:
        getNested in interface SimpleXMLBuilder
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Returns:
        SimpleXMLBuilder

      • setEscapeUnicode

        public boolean setEscapeUnicode(boolean escape_unicode)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleXMLBuilder
        Should high code-point unicode characters be escaped to avoid charset problems. This is advisory only the implementation is free to ignore this call and return false in all cases.
        Specified by:
        setEscapeUnicode in interface SimpleXMLBuilder
        Returns:
        previous setting.
